title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not perform any action. The expected behavior is for the action to add Javadoc to the selected field. It is suggested to either remove this menu option or fix the bug so that it adds Javadoc to the field.
OB: Selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu does not add Javadoc to the field.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' action should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR:
1. Open the TH context menu on a field.
2. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the menu.
3. Check if Javadoc is added to the field.
